column2: You are the current ruler of the glorious Nilfgaard Empire. May your reign be a prosperous one!
Long live the Emperor!
You are no longer the ruler of the Nilfgaard Empire. It will surely crumble without your guiding hand to lead it.
What a loss for the Empire!
The Nilfgaard Empire Invades

The Nilfgaard Empire Has long been eying the North for a chance to continue their aggressive expansion even further. It seem like they have seen a chance and have declare war making you their next target.
There is no chance.
The North will face this threat together.
Call in war against the Nilfgaard Empire
I will never yield.

To [Root.GetTitledName],

having no wish to come in armed conflict against the might of Nilfgaard Empire, I have decided that best course of action to avoid needless casualities, is to swear vassalage to Nilfgaard Empire.

 Sincerely [From.GetBestName]
Excelent!

[Root.GetTitledName],

I ask your assistance against the threat Nilfgaard poses to the North.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
The Nilfgaard is a threat that must be stopped!
Regretfully I can't assist in this war!
I can only lend financial support.

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

with deep regret I must inform you that I can't assist you in this war.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
Damn!

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

after hearing your request I will help you. Although it's impossible for me to join your war, I will assist financially.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
I'll take any help I can get

The Nilfgaard Empire has once more proved superior once more. In addition to seizable land gains we have also rightfully gained Kingdom of [From.Kingdom.GetBaseName]. Now the question is what to do with this title...
I will keep the title for myself.
I will grant it to someone worthy.
I have no need for the title.
